features: Inspired By Disney’S Encanto. Sing With Mirabel And See The Magic Butterfly Glow. Place The Butterfly In Mirabel’S Hand And See It Glow As She Sings.Ideal for ages:3 years and up

Mirabel Says Over 15 Film-Inspired Phrases. Wear The Butterfly On The Bracelet Or Add It To Mirabel’S Headband. Mirabel Doll Is Articulated And Comes Dressed In Her Signature Dress, Glasses, Shoes, Earrings And A Headband - Includes Music From Or Inspired By Disney’S Encanto
Includes: 1 Doll, 1 Doll Dress, 1 Pair Of Doll Shoes, 1 Doll Headband, 1 Butterfly, 1 Bracelet For Child, 1 Pair Of Doll Glasses, 1 Pair Of Doll Earrings
Product In Package Includes Wire To Charge Butterfly Piece For On-Shelf Trial. Please Remove And Discard This Wire Upon Opening The Package
body.description: Walt Disney Animation Studio’S 60Th Feature, Encanto, Tells The Tale Of An Extraordinary Family, The Madrigals, Who Live Hidden In The Mountains Of Colombia, In A Magical House, In A Vibrant Town, In A Wondrous, Charmed Place Called An Encanto. The Magic Of The Encanto Has Blessed Every Child In The Family With A Unique Gift From Super Strength To The Power To Heal Every Child Except One, Mirabel. But When She Discovers That The Magic Surrounding The Encanto Is In Danger, Mirabel Decides That She, The Only Ordinary Madrigal, Might Just Be Her Exceptional Family’S Last Hope. Experience The Magic Of Disney’S Encanto With This Singing Mirabel & Magic Butterfly! In The Story Of Encanto, The Butterfly Symbolizes Unconditional Love, And The Miracle That Saved The Madrigal Family. When You Place It In The Doll’S Hand, This Butterfly Glows As Mirabel Sings And Talks To You! Dressed In Her Signature Fashion Inspired By The Film, Mirabel’S Outfit Includes A Beautiful Embroidery-Styled Dress, With Her Signature Glasses, Espadrille Shoes, And Pom-Pom Earrings. Wear And Share Accessory Play For You Too! The Butterfly Can Be Removed From The Doll’S Hand And Used To Accessorize Her Headband Or Snapped Into The Bracelet For You! Suggested For Kids Ages 3 And Up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My little granddaughter loves her new doll.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Goes perfect with watching the movie with the little one.
reviews.reviewText: Made with such good quality. We have brush her hair a 100 time. Still in perfect condition. She has been drop and dragged through the living room. Not a scratch on her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hard to open
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately the packaging is so hard and confusing to open with a lot of wires everywhere and hard plastic. Although there is a sign that says not to cut the wire around the butterfly, be careful because most likely you will .... you can't tell which wire is which. We did ..and the butterfly does not work. We ended up having to detached the butterfly so the wire won't be expose. Not a very good design .... unlike Disney products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Niece loved it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Over all it's perfect!
reviews.reviewText: Honestly it's perfect, it's cute! However I wish it was a bit louder. My daughter loves the music and the talking but sometimes when other people are talking or her brothers are playing you can't hear it unless she's right next to it. Other than that it's perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Huge win for the birthday girl who loves everything Encanto!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mirabel fans will love this doll!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my granddaughter’s 3rd birthday. She requested an Encanto theme party and loves the movie. She has curly hair and identifies with the character Mirabel. This doll is a perfect likeness, has her voice, is a good size and can stand. It will be loved by Encanto fans … once you manage to get it out of the packaging! My granddaughter immediately put on her glasses and started dancing around to her singing. It comes with batteries which is a plus when you’re gifting. The only downside is the butterfly that allows her to sing comes off easily, I wish it snapped into the wrist so it won’t be lost. Good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great doll for a gift
reviews.reviewText: My little girl loves this doll and sings along with Mirabel to the family madrigal. Such a great gift, only wish the butterfly didn't come out of her hand so easily since my toddler doesnt have the fine motor skills to put it back in. Other than that it's perfect!
